title: Council Decision of 25 June 1996 appointing the Spanish members in the workers category of the Consultative Committee of the European Coal and Steel Community
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 June 1996
appointing the Spanish members in the workers category of the  Consultative Committee of the European Coal and Steel Community
(96/C  214/01)
THE  COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members of the Consultative  Committee of the European Coal and Steel Community for the period up to and including 3 March  1998:
II.  WORKERS CATEGORY
SPAIN
Francisco Javier DE CASTRO ESTEBAN
Rafael VAREA NIETO
Víctor José  FERNÁNDEZ VÁZQUEZ
This Decision shall be published, for information, in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 25 June 1996.
For the Council
The President
M. PINTO
(1) OJ No C 83, 23. 3. 1996, p. 1.
(2) OJ No C 113, 18. 4. 1996, p. 1.
